data.title: Fuck My Fame
data.meta_description:
Fuck My Fame by 3K HOOD, released 10 December 2011

(Outlaw)
Without the hips without the tits without the lips you're nuthin
Chattin on the Facebook doesn't make sense,
Just couple of sex now we are the best.
Accept me as a guest, ain't no chess, straight fuckin forget about 9-11, fuck the politics,
Semi-automatic lyrically, Kush blow your face, are you marry me?
Yeah exactly, turn yo ass down baby, if you wanna say sumthin whisper in my ear,
what you wanna hear? Oh my god its appeared don't make it disappear

(Chorus)
Back in the day (Shyyt) don't even remember know your name
Lay down on me (What can I say) Fuck my Fame

(Abrakt)
Düşman değiliz bebeğim bakma öyle, hatırlamıyorum işte ismini söyle
Aldırmayalım (Aldırmayalım) Aşka doyalım
Bunu delice istiyoruz ikimizde, ya arabaya kaçalım ya da bizde
Geç kalmayalım (Geç kalmayalım) Aşkı bulalım
Şimdi sıralayayım istekleri, teker teker çıkar üstündekileri
Hiç durmayalım (Hiç durmayalım) Aşkla dolalım
Daha sert haydi göster dişlerini, eğil hadi bebeğim kır dizlerini
Aldanmayalım (Aldanmayalım) Sex'e doyalım
Evet hadi şimdi çılgınca inle, gözlerini kapat ve şarkımı dinle
Aldırmayalım (Aldırmayalım) Sex'e doyalım

(Chorus)

(Duzz T)
I'm in the hood real deep where as gangstas creep,
Rollin up a blunt smokin' that gangsta whip,
All I need is T-H-C baby mama with me,
Suckin' on my D-I-C-K for free, cause I don't pay for shit
I'm high on the daily, Fuck that bitch owe me, you better pay me
Cause 3K HOOD run this gangsta shit, and I smoke like its my last day to live
Big drama Imma ride for life, my chronic is my bitch so imma keep her tight
Close grip like that clip that I'm pushing through my banger
Im the type to get high and bang on a stranger
Fall Back into the street and ride slow, turn on that corner pass some po-po
For a pound thats gettin ready for distribution, big drama, I cant lie, Im usin'
data.text: 3K HOOD has formed itself spontaneously over the years when us, a bunch of white Turkish boys with an attiude decided to rap in English, to let the world know that we got something to say.
